website_summaries.verdict: The Targhee Vent surely made hikers comfortable on their outdoor activities. Those who are seeking for a supportive low-cut day hiking shoe will be able to appreciate what this gear has to offer. It was also recognized for its lightness and spacious forefoot region.However, it still missed a couple of points. Overall, with the help of some lacing techniques, interested buyers may be able to realize the full potential of the KEEN Targhee Vent.
pros: The majority exclaimed that the KEEN Targhee Vent was ready for adventures right out of the box
The roomy toe box of this day hiking shoe received compliments from a lot of wearers
Several owners liked the supportive build of the KEEN Targhee Vent despite its low-cut design
It worked well in a variety of outdoor activities, according to plenty of users
Hordes of hikers stated that they were stoked with how the shoe kept their feet cool
The grippy outsole of the Targhee Vent got positive ratings from numerous verified purchasers
Many online buyers commented that the lightness of this day hiking shoe was satisfying
cons: The laces of the Targhee Vent from KEEN did not stay tightened which displeased a couple of hikers
A very low percentage of owners expressed their disappointment with the thin outsole

customer_reviews.title: These hiking shoes are great! (still true) Keen Co. is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Keen made good on the defects.. Awesome Company!! ******previous review****** As you can see from the pics that the lugs on outside edge of both shoes have begun to come unglued. It doesn't change how great the shoes feel but when those lugs roll (while scaling over rocky terrain) they are a tripping hazard. Seriously. I tried Gorilla Glue with a 24hr curing time and that worked for about 30 minutes of walking... :-) I am now going to attempt to contact the seller and get their reaction. I absolutely love the fit and feel of these shoes both on & off the trail. Disappointed in the sole quality... (previous review): The fit perfectly, great quality, excellent design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable for hiking
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a huge fan of Keens as his work shoe, so when we were planning on going on an extended hike in a tropical climate, we were looking for shoes that would be comfortable, yet keep his feet cool. These completely fit the bill. They have great tread, perfect for climbing up the Xunatunich ruins in Belize, and he did not get any blisters despite wearing them on this 4 hour hike for the first time. Incredibly comfortable (per husband) and definitely will buy again when these wear out. They're pretty durable, so I am guessing that will be quite some time down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Punch

customer_reviews.title: Inner fabric wore out in a little over one month!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in these Keen shoes. In a little over a month of use the material on heel pad wore out! The resulting hole in the fabric caused friction which made these shoes unwearable after only one month+ of wearing!!! I am going to try to return if Amazon allows. But so disappointed in these.
customer_reviews.author: WestwardBound1

customer_reviews.title: Type of sock or socks worn dictate your sizing
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the shoe looked great and quality was superb. Only reason I’m rating 3 star is because the toe box of the shoe was somewhat small. I would recommend getting a 1/2 size larger or a wider toe box. The 3 star rating really came down to the tongue attachment at the toe box, it has a thick stitching that rubbed the top of my foot all day. Quality was good, would recommend trying them on first.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my feet excellent. Well built, and extremely comfortable. Intelligent design does not leave you with sore feet, legs or back problems, even after long days walking and standing. Perfectly firm padding, arch support and overall fit. A superb shoe. Not inexpensive, but worth the money if you want a shoe that does not wear out and or breakdown over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Materi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Comfortable Hiking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were comfortable from the beginning. I have found the Keens run a little small for me, so I ordered 1/2 size large and the fit was good, particularly with heavy socks. Though I usually prefer the ankle protection of boots, these are nice. One surprise. They are not much lighter in weight than a set of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit exactly the way I want
customer_reviews.text: My feet are wide for a 10 and I am very happy with how these shoes feel. These are the third Keen products I've owned and so far they are very consistent for fit and quality. Yeah, they are imported. I almost went for the Oboz but I was so confident in the fit being right I went ahead and stuck loyal to Keen.
customer_reviews.author: SquirrelCutter

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe runs a little wide compared with other Keen shoes I have had (I have had so many) I work in a busy ER and walk between 5-7 miles a day 15-20 miles a week. Feel like they last 6-9 months before the cushioning wears out which is much better than when I used to wear running shoes/sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Good look, nice color, great feel
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been researching best hiking shoes and this brand was suggested. He first tried them on at Academy Sporting Goods. Loved the look, feel, and color right away. Checked on Amazon and they were $30 cheaper. Ordered and delivered the next day! My husband is wearing them every chance he gets.
customer_reviews.author: jody hodges

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe to cure sore feet.
customer_reviews.text: Although I thought these would have the laces with sliders on the laces, they are good shoes. I used to fight with sore arches but since I started wearing these Keens with sturdy aftermarket arch supports added, my arches have been good. Two of my sons only wear Keens now too because they needed to fix their sore arches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These get pretty ugly in larger sizes, but are great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have an older pair of Keen that are slightly small on me so I went a size up. The shoes are a little wide but long enough. Despite that, they are very comfortable and I am wearing them for our daily 3 to 4 miles dog walks as well as longer hikes. They are pretty unattractive in the larger size though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of footwear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for work since I walk close to 15 miles a day on hard surfaces and these shoes perform wonderfully. I do a lot of hiking besides work and have been tempted to take these out on the trail because they are so comfortable. The sole is great and appears that it will last but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and durability
customer_reviews.text: Went by reviews and ordered 1/2 size larger, fits perfect. I wore out a pair of voyageurs and decide to give these a try. The soles look better and more durable. The voyageur foot bed separated from the sole but i fixed the with shoe goo. Hopefully that does not happen with these
customer_reviews.author: Squidward

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Keen shoes forever. Always a good fit and comfortable for my daily hikes with dogs. Except for the heels they last forever. My local shoe shop has rebuilt the worn heels, but they never feel right after repair. Those get downgraded to my yard work pairs.
customer_reviews.author: JosephTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of the color before.
customer_reviews.text: Another one of those purchases I wish I would have seen in person before buying. I wanted another pair to replace my old ones. Keen gives so many color options nowdays, but what I really wanted was just than tan, natural leather look. What I ended up buying was this hideous brown. Keen quality but it looks like I have these chocolate bars for hiking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: re: great comfortable and didn't have to break them in.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these shoes, he has wider feet and they fit him very comfortably, he said they were comfortable on our first hike up the smokey mountains, he was in them all day, no blisters or sore feet, thankfully this has been the best brand he has owned.
customer_reviews.author: glorygirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for SoCal
customer_reviews.text: I wanted vented hiking shoes - the issue where I live is heat, not water. I also wanted shoes that grip well on poor quality rock, especially slippery sandstone. These are the best meeting both requirements. The rest you have heard about toe box and quality and that is also true. But is for coolness and grip that I think they really excel.
customer_reviews.author: SEF

customer_reviews.title: Keen shoes are super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just like the headline says! I have flat feet. I can wear Keen's (I have 3 pairs. Boots, Shoes and now sneakers) all day doing all sorts of hiking/walking and my feet are still happy at the end of the day. I could go on and on, but I won't. Keen's are great, look great and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TKDJOHN1

customer_reviews.title: Usually great shoes, but not this model
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black pair and received a blue and grey pair. I kept them because I needed new shoes! Barely a month old and the sole is coming unglued in multiple spots on both shoes. Unusual defect. This is probably my 12th pair of Keen shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M.

customer_reviews.title: Size was right on for me
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 13D and Keen 13 M fit great. Only gave a 4 star because I have only worn them a few times. If they hold up like my Keen water proof hikers ( going on 2 1/2 yrs ) I'll give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J Newswanger

customer_reviews.title: Keen fan for yrs.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable keens I've bought. I did add the keen high arch supports, which I found to be worth the extra $. Seems to be more comfortable in the toe area than a previous pair I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Going back to Voyegeur
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the most comfortable keen on owned. Voyageur is much better. Also don't breath as well and my heel slips and they make a squeak sounds everytime even pushing down on my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Soles become unglued
customer_reviews.text: This is my last pair of Keens. This and the last one I bought had premature separation of the soles. Fit is excellent. Comfort is amazing. Quality is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Land Cruiserman

customer_reviews.title: KEEN:
customer_reviews.text: THIS MICHANIQUE OF THIS SHOW GUID YOUR LEG TO HOW TO WALK AND WHERE THE SHOSE . MAKE OUT OF YOUR LEG A SPORTY LEG AND FIX YOUR KNOEE IESSUE AND LATE YOU WALK COMPFORTLY ..
customer_reviews.author: fabrics

customer_reviews.title: A well made shoe, and an improvement over the similar model from a year or two ago
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable walking shoe that holds up for 15-mile walk, with good support, a good tread (a hiking or approach shoe), and pleasing to the eye. I've been wearing this pair of shoes a lot, and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: MorganR

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband's favorite shoes. He loves the style and finds them to be very comfortable. We will purchase more of them for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Crummy insole.
customer_reviews.text: The lack of quality insole is my only gripe. Put an aftermarket one in and now I really love them.
customer_reviews.author: JeffersonOh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Well worth the money. Third pair of Keen shoes I’ve owned. Being vented makes them really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: EJ Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent footwear
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of the Keen Hiking type shoes. I love them, the stock cushion fits my foot comfortably with no needed break-in period. Highly recommend any Keen shoe, I also have Keen boots for the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: If you like adventure and walk a lot this is best you can get.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of keen, for now only one day of use, is lighter than last year version and feels cool. I used walk NYC everyday, traveling by bus, subway and train too much stairs and wet floor everywhere is the best shoe I used.
customer_reviews.author: César Toledo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits as expected. Could use a better insole perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: My foot has an average length, but needs a wider front. The KEEN Men's Targhee Vent Hiking Shoe fits perfectly. I am also very pleased with overall quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: They fit just as described they have been indestructible so far and my husband is extremely hard on shoes I will be ordering him these from now on best purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Wiesner

customer_reviews.title: Just a little off
customer_reviews.text: Tight and not like other Keens with wide insole. As well arch support was much thicker and bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: My dad was looking to replace a well worn pair from long ago. Thankfully, they havent changed much and we found the same shoe. He is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bin wearing keens for years they really fit my feet. Thanks again for making such an excellent product line
customer_reviews.author: Thunder Storm

customer_reviews.title: Shoes very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his keen for they are his first pair. He works on a cement floor and his feet and knees do not hurt anymore!! He likes his keen and will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and product was as described and fit well. I like the wider toe box of keen shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these Keen shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great service from this vendor. Quick shipping! Shoes fit well, great support, great for walking!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: An excellent Keen Product
customer_reviews.text: Keen are my favorite shoes. This is my second pair of Keen Targhee Hiking Shoes. Over the years, I have owned several different Keen Shoes and Sandals. A Brand that I will stick with.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced and loved!
customer_reviews.text: We we looking to replace a well worn pair of Keen’s for my husband. They were a perfect fit with no break in necessary. He lives them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: taking a while to break them in..
customer_reviews.text: Slow to break in and after 2 serious hiking days parts of the shoe is still pinching my foot
customer_reviews.author: Diane Critchley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for my 30 year old One Sport shoes. These look like and fit like my old One Sport. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, Feel great, Side is blown out of right shoe in a month and a half.
customer_reviews.text: I've over seas and wear these everyday. They fit and feel are great but, the side is blowing out in almost two months. They normally last a year with everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie davis

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have use these shoes before And this was exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look good, too
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most comfortable shoes I own. The fit is almost perfect. Arch support is unbeatable. I wear these shoes as casual wear and I have received many compliments on their looks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Hendershott

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best every day shoes I have ever had. I wear them every day and this is my third pair. Each pair lasts about a year for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K. Tokheim

customer_reviews.title: Durable Construction
customer_reviews.text: I weigh in at around 240#. Work in the maintenance field. Ladders. Kicking. Digging. ect. They hold as well as to be expected considering.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Instant comfort when wearing these shoes. Keen is a perfect fit for my husband and picking an off color saved us $$...thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Fit has changed
customer_reviews.text: Returned product as it was too wide in ankle area Not same as previous Keen I have purchased
customer_reviews.author: William G. Van Tassell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be well made, nice insole, plenty of toe space. Second pair
customer_reviews.author: Art Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe. Wear these shoes everyday due sturdy construction and feet never feel tired.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Sole blew out on 4th hike
customer_reviews.text: I like these Keen's - good traction and fit. I use them exclusively for hiking. On my 4th hike up a 14-footer, the sole broke loose on the way down. Only had them a few months. Failed way too early. Contacted Keen and they gave me a full refund. Glad they stand behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: John Dallmann

customer_reviews.title: What's most important to know?
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the nice fit of these shoes and how light they were while being supportive. A good combination.
customer_reviews.author: S. Loftin

customer_reviews.title: The tongue dug into The  bridge of my foot
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very uncomfortable and not usable. I intend to return for an exchange. I do not have a UPS Store within 50+ miles of my current location so I will try to return them when I return home in April.
customer_reviews.author: John Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hiking and walking shoes meant to last.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, stylish and comfortable straight out of the box. Great product for walking and hiking in clear conditions. Hope to wear these for five years plus just like my last Keen purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Keens are still the best.
customer_reviews.text: I love these keens. I used them for work. I put 4 to 6 miles per day in these, and when i get home my feet still feel great. I have the black & gray color as well. Once these wear down i will buy this style again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: We liked the look but they were too big so we had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bouffard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hiking shoe. It has good grip, nice toe box and breathes well.
customer_reviews.author: Wayward Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but unfortunately tongue
customer_reviews.text: I've always wore keen, I liked these shoes but unfortunately the tongue was too short and kept moving to the side and really bothered my feet. Had to return them, was hassle free thanks to Amazon 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jadon Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. I ordered 1/2 size larger and they fit perfectly. Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Eblen

customer_reviews.title: Great Support.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. Typical Keen, great support for people with plantar fasciitis. Orthotics fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, they do breath well, very comfortable. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: James Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: Sole is seperating from shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Sole started to separate from shoe within 60. Contacted Keen, they required excessive amount of pictures and details and resisted the return of the product. Poor Quality Poor customer service. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected.....excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Another perfect example of the quality and comfort of Keen Hiking shoes. Based on other reviews, I did order one half size up and these fit perfectly out of the box. Highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: So far a great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Use for everyday wear. Have had them for about a month & are everything I hoped they would be. I love the comfort, & look of them. They fit great. I take 10.5 shoes & ordered 10.5. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Brow

customer_reviews.title: Toe Room
customer_reviews.text: I love having room for my toes. It’s nice to have shoes shaped for feet.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Bond

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this style of Keen show. The first pair lasted 4 years and many miles of walking. This is my go to shoe for walking on sidewalks, or rough trails. My foot problems are a thing of the past with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph W. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Inside fabric not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of Keens. Low, mid and high. Normally VERY Durable. This pair tore on the inside heel after only 3 moths of sporadic use. Other pairs didnt rip for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Shoelace loop broke
customer_reviews.text: The shoelace loop broke the first time I put the shoe on
customer_reviews.author: Tina Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Keen is still Keen
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected from Keen. Great fit, very comfortable, great support, and rugged look.
customer_reviews.author: DeVaughn

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. Fit great. Comfortable. Good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S. Snow

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, it's probably a half number too big but with the thick sucks are just fine, I wear them for hiking
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Campaigniac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: True to form, Keen shoes fit great right out of the box. This is my third pair and I am yet to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Keep feet cool
customer_reviews.text: Use for work. Feet dont sweat as much as mu other boots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KEEN Men's 1018577 Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description: Keen Targhee Vent Mid Walking Shoes Stay comfortable and protected on difficult terrain with the Keen Targhee Vent Mid Walking Shoes. With a breathable leather upper and EVA midsole both stability and cushioning are provided in abundance while the rubber outsole offers excellent grip and traction. Breathable Vent Upper Constructed using a performance mesh upper, the targhee exp works to increase ventilation. By increasing airflow, the fabrication creates an airy fit on hot, longer distance days. The upper is designed to offer you exceptional breathability. Air is actively encouraged to enter and exit freely to keep you feeling ventilated and comfortable. The upper is treated with an eco anti-odour treatment, which will mean that the shoes will smell and feel fresh. Additionally, a polyurethane-coated leather mud shield offers resilient durability while reinforced eyelets allow easy adjustment to help further the comfort. Dual-Density EVA Midsole The EVA midsole significantly improves the cushioning and comfort to help each stride and improve the level of your performance so you can stay at your optimum level, for longer. The compression moulded EVA Midsole holds excellent cushioning abilities absorbing shock as you the heel strike phase of the gait cycle ensuring that with every step you take you get the same shock absorption and comfort. Additionally, removable metatomical EVA insoles provide added underfoot cushioning. Rubber Outsole The Keen All-Terrain Rubber Outsole gives the wearer protection on difficult and arduous terrain as well as an abundance of grip and high traction so you can gain the most from your walk. The outsole is durable and provides a solid base to reduce the risk of injuries and ease the strain placed upon your joints. The ESS Shank also helps to protect you against jagged ground and stone bruises whilst a resilient internal nylon shank provides added stability and support.
feature_bullets: Water resistant, oiled nubuck leather upper
Speed hooks, for easy lace adjustment
Injected TPU heel-capture system for stability
